item.title: My ::maxme wont work:(
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:13, topic:129803”]Wait, ownage, wouldn’t it be

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxme") && playerRights >= 2) { for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); sendMessage("Ok, got all your stats 99, are you happy now?"); }
Instead of

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxme") && playerRights >= 2) { for (int i = 0; i < 25; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); } sendMessage("Ok, got all your stats 99, are you happy now?"); }
?[/quote]

Depends do you want it to send the message every time ?

That or add savemoreinfo(); after the sendmessage

Read full topic

item.title: My ::maxme wont work:(
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

ok when i type ::maxme you see all your stats go to 99 then it logs you out and in but they go back to same stats as be4 please help me this is the command

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxme") && (playerRights >= 2)) // Master command, finally here =) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9); addSkillXP(14000000, 10); addSkillXP(14000000, 11); addSkillXP(14000000, 12); addSkillXP(14000000, 13); addSkillXP(14000000, 14); addSkillXP(14000000, 15); addSkillXP(14000000, 16); addSkillXP(14000000, 17); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); addSkillXP(14000000, 19); addSkillXP(14000000, 20); addSkillXP(14000000, 21); addSkillXP(14000000, 22); addSkillXP(14000000, 23); addSkillXP(14000000, 24); sendMessage("Ok, got all your stats 99, are you happy now?"); }
